movies.title: Erotic Ghost Story III
movies.originalTitle: Liao zhai san ji zhi deng cao he shang
movies.plot: A man is drawn into the world of the afterlife where he falls for a powerful woman.
movies.simplePlot: A man is drawn into the world of the afterlife where he falls for a powerful woman.

biography.bio: Born in Shanghai, China, as Pinyin Chen Baolian, Pauline Chan emigrated to Hong Kong at age 12 with her mother when her parents divorced. A beautiful young girl, it didn't take long for photographers and agents to notice her and she began modeling at 15. In 1990 she entered the Miss Asia beauty pageant. She didn't win, but her striking looks, lithe body and classy bearing attracted the attention of several producers in Hong Kong's adult film industry. At age 18 she made her adult-film debut and her enthusiastic performances shot her to the top of the Chinese porn field. In 1997 she hooked up with a much older man, a Taiwanese millionaire, and they had a short (two-year) but stormy relationship. After their break-up in 1999, Chan's personal and professional lives began to unravel. She had had a drug problem for several years and it got worse--during one television interview in which she was apparently high on drugs she actually tried to commit suicide. A series of brushes with the law ensued, resulting in her being deported from several countries, and she was briefly sent to prison in the UK for assault. These and other incidents pretty much pulled the plug on her film career. She moved back to her hometown of Shanghai and in July of 2002 gave birth to a baby boy. Motherhood didn't solve her problems, however, and on July 31, 2002, she leaped out of the window of her 24th-floor apartment and plunged to her death.
biography.name: Pauline Chan

biography.bio: Fui-On Shing was born on February 1, 1955 in Hong Kong. He was an actor, known for The Crazy Companies (1988). He died on August 27, 2009 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Fui-On Shing

biography.bio: King-Man Chik is an actress, known for On the Edge (2006), Whispers and Moans (2007) and Erotic Ghost Story III (1992).
biography.name: King-Man Chik

biography.bio: Rena Otomo is an actress, known for Wen lang zhi wen ti shao nu (1994), Qing bu zi jin zhi xiang ru fei fei (1993) and Yan long yap sat (1993).
biography.name: Rena Otomo

biography.bio: Tak-Bun Wong was born on April 30, 1963 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor and assistant director, known for New Police Story (2004), The Detective (2007) and Lady Cop & Papa Crook (2008).
biography.name: Tak-Bun Wong

biography.placeOfBirth: Kowloon City, Hong Kong, British Crown Colony
biography.bio: Ka-Kui Ho was born on March 14, 1951 in Kowloon City, Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is known for his work on Riki-Oh: The Story of Ricky (1991), Prison on Fire (1987) and La secte du lotus blanc (1992). He died on January 27, 2015 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Ka-Kui Ho

biography.bio: Aki Tanzawa is an actress, known for Erotic Ghost Story III (1992).
biography.name: Aki Tanzawa

biography.bio: Sau Kei Lee was born on August 14, 1920 in Hong Kong. He was an actor and director, known for The Longest Nite (1998), Eat a Bowl of Tea (1989) and The Flying Guillotine (1975). He died on December 31, 2004 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Sau Kei Lee

biography.bio: Seng-Kwong Chang is an actor, known for A Better Tomorrow (1986), A Better Tomorrow II (1987) and Project A (1983).
biography.name: Seng-Kwong Chang

biography.bio: Wai Man Tam is known for his work on Push (2009), Hard Boiled (1992) and Hitman (1998).
biography.name: Wai Man Tam

biography.bio: Yiu Ging Lee is an actor, known for Une balle dans la tête (1990), Erotic Ghost Story III (1992) and Biao jie, ni hao ye! (1990).
biography.name: Yiu Ging Lee

biography.bio: Jack Wai-Leung Wong is known for his work on Hero (2002), Scooby-Doo (2002) and Eragon (2006).
biography.name: Jack Wai-Leung Wong

biography.bio: Ching-Wah Cheung is an actor, known for Erotic Ghost Story III (1992) and Ban yao ru niang (1992).
biography.name: Ching-Wah Cheung
